entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
